column3: PreProcedure EGSE
Unpack EGSE, cables and equipment
Check EGSE, cables and equipment for obvious damage
Position EGSE on solid surface
Connect Grounding cable to EGSE
Verify Grounding Connection with Ohm-Meter
Position High Pressure Supply Module and N2O Supply Module at designated position
Connect valve EPV to HPSM-Box
Connect valve HPV1 to HPSM-Box
Connect valve HPV2 to HPSM-Box
Connect valve HPDV to HPSM-Box
Connect MPV3 to HPSM-Box
Connect valve MPV1 to HPSM-Box
Connect valve MPV2 to HPSM-Box
Connect warning lamp WarnL to HPSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors EPV_o and EPV_c to the HPSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors HPV1_o and HPV1_c to the HPSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors HPV2_o and HPV2_c to the HPSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors HPDV_o and HPDV_c to the HPSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors MPV3_o and MPV3_c to the HPSM-Box
Connect pressure sensor HPPT1 to the HPSM-Box
Connect pressure sensor HPPT2 to the HPSM-Box
Connect pressure sensor HPLPT to the HPSM-Box
Connect valve OxV1 to N2OSM-Box
Connect valve OxV2 to N2OSM-Box
Connect valve OxDV to N2OSM-Box
Connect Heaters to N2OSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors OxV1_o and OxV1_c to the N2OSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors OxV2_o and OxV2_c to the N2OSM-Box
Connect inductive sensors OxDV_o and OxDV_c to the N2OSM-Box
Connect pressure sensor OxInPT1 to the N2OSM-Box
Connect pressure sensor OxInPT2 to the N2OSM-Box
Connect pressure sensor OxOutPT to the N2OSM-Box
Position the Umbillical-Box on the swing arm at the designated position.
Connect actuator Schwenki to the Umbillical-Box
Connect actuator N2O clutch to the Umbillical-Box
Connect actuator He clutch to the Umbillical-Box
Make sure that the primary supply line at EGSE is not plugged into a socket
Make sure that the secondary supply line is not plugged into a socket
Make sure that all switches on the Control Panel are turned off
Make sure that all diconnect terminals at the PSU are open
Make sure that both FI switches are open
Connect the EGSE to the HPSM-Box with the corresponding cable
Connect the EGSE to the N2OSM-Box with the corresponding cable
Connect Heater supply line at N2OSM into EGSE corresponding socket
Connect the EGSE to the Umbillical-Box with the corresponding cable
Connect the data Umbillical and the ignition Umbillical to the Umbillical-Box
Connect the data Umbillical to the rocket
Make sure that the Ignition Umbillical is not connected to the rocket
Make sure that the bridges B1 and B2 are open in EGSE
Connect the Ethernet cable from the sbRio to the Ethernet switch in the EGSE
Connect USB from Telemega to the EGSE
Connect USB from EGSE to ComTerm
Make sure all switches on CLD are in OFF state
Connect the EGSE to the CLD with the corresponding cable
Connect the Ethernet cable from the MCC to the Ethernet switch in the EGSE
Connect the load cell with the cRIO
Connect Thermocouple AmbT with the Panel No. 1
Connect Thermocouple OxT1 with the Panel No. 2
Connect Thermocouple OxWT1 with the Panel No. 3
Connect Thermocouple OxT2 with the Panel No. 4
Connect Thermocouple OxWT2 with the Panel No. 5
Connect Thermocouple HPT with the Panel No. 6
Connect Thermocouple HPWT with the Panel No. 7
Make sure that all switches on the Control Panel are turned off
Make sure that all diconnect terminals at the PSU are open
Make sure that both FI switches are open
Check that the fuses are inserted at the PSU
Check the continuity of the 20 A fuse for the power supply Sup_24V_40A
Check the continuity of the 10 A fuse for the power supply Sup_5V_10A
Check the continuity of the 20 A fuse for the power supply Sup_24V_20A
Check the continuity of the 10 A fuse for the power supply Sup_24V_10A
Check the continuity of the 10 A fuse for the power supply Sup_12V_10A
Make sure that all disconnect terminals at the UPSU are open
Check that the fuses are inserted at the UPSU
Check the continuity of the 20 A fuse for the power supply Bat_24V_20A
Check the continuity of the 10 A fuse for the power supply Bat_24V_10A
Check the continuity of the 10 A fuse for the power supply Bat_12V_10A
Check charger for Bat_24V_20A is inserted to the socket
Check charger for Bat_24V_10A is inserted to the socket
Check charger for Bat_12V_10A is inserted to the socket
Plug the primary supply line into the EGSE
Plug the primary supply line into the socket
Plug the secondary supply line into the EGSE
Plug the secondary supply line into the socket
Switch the FI switches to the closed state
Close the disconnect terminals at the PSU
Close the disconnect terminals at the UPSU
Switch on the primary and secondary supply switches on the Control Panel
Switch on Sup_24V_20A
Check Voltage Disp_Sup_24V_20A 27,2 V
Switch on Sup_24V_10A
Check Voltage Disp_Sup_24V_10A 27,2 V
Switch on Sup_12V_10A
Check Voltage Disp_Sup_12V_10A 13,8 V
Switch on Bat_24V_20A
Check Voltage Disp_Bat_24V_20A 27,6 V
Switch on Bat_24V_10A
Check Voltage Disp_Bat_24V_10A 27,6 V
Switch on Bat_12V_10A
Check Voltage Disp_Bat_12V_10A 13,8 V
Switch on Sup_24V_40A
Switch on Sup_5V_10A
Connect external supply to the CLD
Switch on CLD_Power_ON_OFF
Check Voltage Disp_Bat_CLD 27,6 V
Set up „MCC Main PC“
Open „SW_EGSE.Ivproj“
Right click on “NI-cRIO-9067”
Click on “Connect”
Double click on “RT_Main.vi” to open this program
Click on „Run“ to start „RT_Main.vi“
Double click on “PID_Main.vi” to open this program
Click on „Run“ to start „PID_Main.vi“
Perform EGSE Sensor & Actuator Test
BEGIN SEQUENCE: EGSE Powerline Failure Test
Confirm that „RT_Main.vi“ and „PID_Main.vi“ is running
Rename PID data recording file
Start PID data recording
Switch off primary and secondary supply switches on the Control Panel
Write down Time Stamp
Perform EGSE Sensor & Actuator Test
Close HPDV
Close OxDV
Wait 15 min and check system is nominal
Check and write down Voltage Disp_Sup_24V_20A >23V
Check and write down Voltage Disp_Sup_24V_10A >23V
Check and write down Voltage Disp_Sup_12V_10A >11V
Check and write down Voltage Disp_Bat_24V_20A >23V
Check and write down Voltage Disp_Bat_24V_10A >23V
Check and write down Voltage Disp_Bat_12V_10A >11V
Open HPDV
Open OxDV
Perform EGSE Sensor & Actuator Test
Switch on primary and secondary supply switches on the Control Panel
Stop PID data recording and save file
END SEQUENCE: EGSE Powerline Failure Test
Perform Ignition Signal Test
